item.title: Confession and Bad Touch
item.description: Everything relating to Isabeau's disastrous love life. Includes both the confession attempts in the final room, as well as the shoulder touches and associated event at the Favor Tree.

item.title: Odilequest
item.description: Everything about Odile's Friendquest. Includes all preparations for it, like scouring libraries, talking to the Boulanger, arguing with children, and everything Loop has to say on the subject. And the main scene itself, of course.

item.title: About page
item.description: In order to cut down on sidebar space on every page, I now have an About page to be verbose about site formatting practicies.

item.title: Testing, testing!
item.description: Hello hello? Does this thing work?
